```{r}
data %>%
  ggplot(aes(Velocity)) +
  stat_ecdf() +
  labs(y = 'Empirical CDF')
```

```{r}
set.seed(42)

cdf <- function(data) {
  data %>%
    arrange(x) %>%
    mutate(p = cumsum(p)) %>%
    ggplot(aes(x, p)) +
    geom_line() +
    labs(y = 'Sample CDF')
}

prior_stick_breaking <- function(n, alpha, mu = 20, sigma = 3) {
  x <- rnorm(n, mean = mu, sd = sigma)
  v <- rbeta(n, shape1 = 1, shape2 = alpha)
  w <- cumprod(1 - c(0, head(v, -1)))
  tibble(x = x, p = v * w)
}

cdf(prior_stick_breaking(n = 10000, alpha = 10))
```
